snippet: A shared program by the dancers Ashley Chen and Dylan Crossman at the Club at La MaMa on Friday was partly sophisticated and partly sophomoric.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by Ashley Chen and Dylan Crossman at La MaMa as part of dual presentation by Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas and La MaMa Moves! Dance Festival.
lead_paragraph: A shared program by the dancers Ashley Chen and Dylan Crossman at the Club at La MaMa on Friday was partly sophisticated and partly sophomoric.

headline.seo: Ashley Chen and Dylan Crossman at the Club at La MaMa
headline.main: Driven to Accumulate and Dancing Till Nothing’s Left
headline.print_headline: Driven to Accumulate and Dancing Till Nothing’s Left
